Song.title: Jesus I Am Resting Resting
Song.copyright: David Hampton | Jean Sophia Pigott Â© 1998 New Spring (Admin. by Brentwood-Benson Music Publishing, Inc.)

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: Jesus [Bb]I am r[C/E]esting r[F2]esting, in the [Bb]joy of [C/E]what Thou [F/A]art I am f[Bb]inding [C2/E]out the gr[F2]eatness ff Thy [Bbmaj7]lov -- [C]ing h[F]eart Thou hast [Bbmaj7]bid me [C2/E]gaze up - [F2/A]on Thee and Thy b[Dm]eauty [C]fills my [Bbmaj7]soul For by [Bb2/D]Thy trans - f[C/E]orming p[F/A]ower Thou hast [Bb]made [C]me w[F]hole
Chorus: Jesus [Bbmaj7] I am r[C/E]esting r[F/A]esting in the [Dm]joy of [Am/C]what Thou [Bb]art I am [Bb2/D]finding [C2/E]out the gr[F2/A]eatness of Thy [Bbmaj7]lov - [C]ing h[F]eart
Verse 2: Oh how [Bb]great Thy l[C/E]oving ki[F2]ndness vaster b[Bb]roader [C/E]than the [F/A]sea Oh how [Bb]marvel - [C2/E]ous Thy go[F2]odness lavished [Bbmaj7]all [C]on [F]me Yes I [Bbmaj7]rest in [C2/E]Thee Be[F2/A]loved know what w[Dm]ealth of g[C]race is [Bbmaj7]Thine Know Thy [Bb2/D]certain - [C/E]ty of pr[F/A]omise and have [Bb]made [C]it [F]mine
Verse 3: Simply tr[Bb]usting [C/E]Thee Lord [F2]Jesus I beh[Bb]old Thee [C/E]as Thou [F/A]art And Thy l[Bb]ove so [C2/E]pure so ch[F2]angeless satis - [Bbmaj7]fies [C]my h[F]eart Sa[Bbmaj7]tisfies its d[C2/E]eepest l[F2/A]ongings meets sup - [Dm]plies its e[C]v'ry [Bbmaj7]need Compass [Bb2/D]- eth me '[C/E]round with bl[F/A]essings thine is [Bb]love [C]in - d[F]eed
Verse 4: Ever [Bb]lift Thy [C/E]face up[F2]on me as I [Bb]work and [C/E]wait for [F/A]Thee Resting 'n[Bb]eath Thy [C2/E]smile Lord J[F2]esus earth's dark [Bbmaj7]shad - [C]ows f[F]lee Brightness [Bbmaj7]of my F[C2/E]ather's [F2/A]glory sunshine [Dm]of my Fat[C]her's [Bbmaj7]face Keep me [Bb2/D]ever tr[C/E]usting r[F/A]esting fill me [Bb]with [C]Thy g[F]race
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 jesus i am resting resting in the joy of what thou art i am finding out the greatness ff thy lov ing heart thou hast bid me gaze up on thee and thy beauty fills my soul for by thy trans forming power thou hast made me whole chorus jesus i am resting resting in the joy of what thou art i am finding out the greatness of thy lov ing heart verse 2 oh how great thy loving kindness vaster broader than the sea oh how marvel ous thy goodness lavished all on me yes i rest in thee beloved know what wealth of grace is thine know thy certain ty of promise and have made it mine verse 3 simply trusting thee lord jesus i behold thee as thou art and thy love so pure so changeless satis fies my heart satisfies its deepest longings meets sup plies its evry need compass eth me round with blessings thine is love in deed verse 4 ever lift thy face upon me as i work and wait for thee resting neath thy smile lord jesus earths dark shad ows flee brightness of my fathers glory sunshine of my fathers face keep me ever trusting resting fill me with thy grace
